attributes.action: Police to carry out a search on flats and landfill site in Corrie Mckeague case
attributes.background:
On 24 September RAF serviceman Corrie Mckeague went missing. Vital pieces of investigation have not been done by Suffolk police.

We want the police to carry out a thorough search on both the flats in the Horseshoe area of Bury St Edmunds and also to check the landfill site.

rejection.details:
This would be an operational decision for the police, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you're concerned about policing in Suffolk, you could contact the local elected Police and Crime Commissioner:

http://www.suffolk-pcc.gov.uk/
